title: Nervous Passenger
lyrics:
"Roosevelt Is next. Doors open on the left at Roosevelt."
Take me anywhere
I am a nervous passenger
I'll make it back if I can
I won't make you wait forever



I swear I'll meet you

Where the violets in the Spring bloom

Come out, the blood in my veins

Enough blood in my veins



So take me anywhere

I am a nervous passenger

I'll make you deaf if I can

I wanna make you wait forever



What more to honor crooks and thieves

What more when we're meant to be

Is it too late to save me

Or am I only a distant memory
